body: Riboflavin is to FAD as Pantothenate is to:

answer: A METHIONINE MOLECULE, THE DIAMETER OF A DNA MOLECULE, A RIBOSOME, A RICKETTSIA

choices.W: the larger the f-number, the more light reaches the film
choices.X: the larger the f-number, the greater the depth of field
choices.Y: the smaller the f-number, the lesser the light reaches the film
choices.Z: the smaller the f-number, the greater the depth of field

answer: X) THE LARGER THE F- NUMBER, THE GREATER THE DEPTH OF FIELD

answer: EDIT; PREPROCESS; COMPILE; LINK; LOAD; EXECUTE

body: Select the hormone NOT CORRECTLY paired with its target:

choices.Y: TSH and thyroid parafollicular C cells

answer: Y) TSH AND THYROID PARAFOLICULAR C CELLS

body: Using the following single stranded DNA, give the corresponding messenger RNA sequence: TAC - GGA - GGG - GCA - CCC - TAT - TTA
answer: AUG - CCU - CCC - CGU - GGG - AUA - AAU

body: What principal, enunciated in 1927, was to that date the most direct challenge to the deterministic nature of the universe?

To a stargazer living in Northern Michigan, a star that lies almost exactly on the celestial equator, such as sigma Orionis, will do which of the following:

choices.W: spend 12 hours above the horizon and 12 hours below
choices.X: rise in the north and set in the south
choices.Z: its diurnal path is cut by the horizon into unequal parts

answer: W) SPEND 12 HOURS ABOVE THE HORIZON AND 12 HOURS BELOW
